title: Conquer It!
desc: Exposure therapy for people suffering from arachnophobia. Users are gradually exposed to more and more graphic imagery of spiders, from hand-drawn circles with lines to cinematic scenes involving spiders.

title: Pizza 3001
desc: Tracking number of drivers needed for a hypothetical pizza chain, based on randomly generated data.  Tables are dynamically created based on data sets provided.
